descriptionProfile: US BC OMS posting mainly bloody teeth w/ some other stuff from time to time. All cases are my own; never a repeat/repost. Snap:@bloodytooth.guy

posts.description:
There's more than one way to skin a cat... For a narrow posterior #mandibular ridge, sometimes, I'll onlay, and other times, I'll ridge split. It's not quite an #infinitedilemma, but it is a decision that requires some thought. 
#bonegraft #bonegrafting #dentalimplant #dentalimplants #internalfixation #rigidfixation #oralandmaxillofacialsurgery #oralsurgery #oralsurgeon #jawbone #mandible #mandibles #bloodytooth #bloodyteeth #implantesdentales #implantesdentarios #open #interesting

#EasterSunday night. So pumped for tomorrow to get back into it. Always ready to #hustle.  Hope you enjoy this #dentalphotography I took during a case I did last week. The perforations u see in the lateral cortex of the #mandible were made to increase bloodflow to the grafted material. In this case, I used a cortical strut harvested from the chin w/ some allograft as well. I also used a pericardial membrane (a little nod to some of my #periodontal colleagues), and fortunately, I was able to achieve a tension-free, primary, hemostatic closure. #60secClub

I do a lot of these #impacted #maxillary #canine exposure cases as part of comprehensive #orthodontic treatment referred by the #orthodontists in the area, and most of them are pretty routine...this one, I liked a lot. It's always nice to work w an #orthodontist who thinks outside the box in terms of treatment planning, execution, and patient management. 
#lingualbraces #braces #braceface #orthodontics #smiledesign #impactedcanine #perfectsmile #oralsurgery #oralsurgeon #cirugiaoral #cirugiabucal #ortodoncia #ortodontia #ortodoncista #ortodonti #ortodoncialingual #ortodontista #ortodontiaestetica #ortodontialingual #orthodontictreatment #specialist

The weather outside is kinda crappy around NYC today...hopefully, it doesn't mess with tonight's plans too much. Bright sideðŸ’¥...It's been a pretty decent day in the office today. Here's an #instagood #dentalphoto from a #sinuslift and #dentalimplant case from this morning. 
#bonegrafting #bonegraft #maxilla #oralsurgery #oralsurgeon #dentalphotography #dentalart #straumannimplants #straumann #bone #bloody #sinus #sinuslifting #maxillary #dentalimplants #dentalimplantsurgery #implantology #implantodontia #implantsurgery #cirugiaoral #cirugiabucal #oralandmaxillofacialsurgery

Back in October, I posted this #dentalphotography (#dentalpicture on the left) of a #ridgesplit procedure I performed on a patient in order to give her the necessary width for #dentalimplants in the posterior #mandible. Today, (#dentalphoto on the right) after evaluating the results by CBCT and determining that the #bonegrafting was successful, at least in terms of gained width/volume, we reopened the site, removed the fixation screws, and were so excited to see that the quality of the #bone was as favorable as we hoped it would be. We placed 3 #straumannimplants (BLTs) in the areas of 18, 19, and 21. Each #dentalimplant torqued to greater than 35, and I'm confident the results will speak for themselves. 
#outcomes #implantesdentales #implantsurgery #straumann #mandibular #oralsurgery #oralsurgeon #omfs #implants #implantodontia #implantedental #implantodontista #implantology #bloodyteeth #beforeandafter #bonegraft #success #nextlevel #blades

So...I obviously post a lot of #oralsurgery photos (well...maybe not so many lately, but I'm def focused on it again), but I do other things too...here's a pic of a layered closure of a small #scalp #laceration from an #emergency patient yesterday afternoon. Most of the time, for these type of #lacerations, we use staples, but this was a young kid, and I thought...why not?! #sutures #suturing #suture #snitchesgetstitches  #justadentist #omfs #oralandmaxillofacialsurgery #trauma #plasticsurgery #beforeandafter #cirugiaplastica  #hirsute #hairy #maxillofacial #traumatic #lacerations #repair #stitched #stitches #justpartofmyday

#artiseverywhere...truly...everywhere. You just need to know where to look. 
This #dentalphotography illustrates the exposure of an #impacted #maxillary #canine. Typically, these #teeth are palatally positioned, but in this case, the #impactedtooth was labial to the adjacent lateral #incisor. Using a 15c blade (which, by the way, a friend introduced me to some time ago, and I have become a huge fan), I created a full-thickness mucoperiosteal flap w/ a distal vertical release. I bonded a button to the facial surface of the canine and attached the #goldchain to the maxillary #orthodontic arch wire. I then perforated the cortical bone and closed primarily w/ 4.0 chromic gut #sutures on a tapered needle. 
#dentalart #dentalpics #dentalpicture #oralsurgery #oralsurgeon #cirugiaoral #cirugiabucal #cirurgiaoral #orthodontics #orthodontist #orthodontictreatment #ortodoncia #ortodontia #ortodonti #ortodoncista #braces #bladesofglory

Those #roots tho. A lot of people say, they'd rather be lucky than good.  There's a lot to be said about being #fortunate or #blessed. I mean...how else can you explain this?  #universe?
